segments.text: Hello , my name is Bill Martin and we have a reservation for party tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to cancel that . We have had a last minute change of plans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Would you like me to reschedule you for another night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , we will let you know as early as possible . By the way , will we be able to get a refund on this cancellation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . I hope we can help you at some other time . Good-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
